name: Stopping Not Allowed
description:
Controls:

WASD/</\\/>  -  movement

Z - Become bigger.

X - Become smaller.

Enter - confirm (in menu)

Every time you hit a wall you lose hp. The smaller you are, the more you lose.

Credits:

Color palette : https://lospec.com/palette-list/atom-8

Sound effects generated in jsfxr.

Music generated in Wolfram Tones.
